briefTitle: Does Heart Rate Variablity (HRV) Predict Hypotension in Patients Undergoing Cervical Myelopathy Surgery ?
officialTitle: Does Heart Rate Variablity (HRV) Predict Hypotension on Induction in Patients Undergoing Surgery for Cervical Myelopathy ?

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adults patients, aged 18 - 70 years with the history of cervical myelopathy, presenting for anterior or posterior cervical decompression and fusion.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Patients with arrhythmias or absence of sinus rhythm
2. Diabetic patients
3. Degenerative neurological disease e.g. Parkinson's disease
4. Complete SCI
5. Inherited autonomic dysfunction

primary.description: Difference between total power (ms2) of patients in the hypotension group compared to stable group
Differences in HRV indices between hypotension group and no hypotension group
Preoperative Analysis Mean Arterial Pressure between hypotension group and no hypotension group
